00033 net_load::net_load(string plugin_id,
00034                    map<string,string> properties)
00035 {
00036     // Customize if needed
00037     if(!initialize_plugin(properties))
00038         throw runtime_error("net_load plugin could not be initialized");
00039     
00040 }

00047 net_load::~net_load()
00048 {
00049     // Customize if needed
00050     sigar_close(sig_);
00051 }

00060 bool net_load::initialize_plugin(map<string,string> properties) 
00061 {
00062     // Customize if needed
00063     sigar_open(&sig_);
00064 
00065     sigar_net_info_t net_info;
00066     sigar_net_info_get(sig_, &net_info);
00067     
00068     strcpy(hostname_,net_info.host_name);
00069     
00070     return true;
00071 }
00072 
00085 bool net_load::generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00086                                                 DDS_DynamicData *data)
00087 {
00088 
00089     data->set_string("hostname",
00090                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00091                      hostname_);
00092 
00093 
00094     sigar_net_interface_list_get(sig_,&iflist_);
00095   
00096     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < iflist_.number; i++) {
00097         sigar_net_interface_config_get(sig_,iflist_.data[i],&ifconfig_);
00098         
00099         //Interface config
00100         data->set_string("device",
00101                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00102                          ifconfig_.name);
00103         
00104         data->set_string("type",
00105                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00106                          ifconfig_.type);
00107         
00108         data->set_string("description",
00109                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00110                          ifconfig_.description);
00111 
00112         //Deal with net addresses
00113         char hwaddr[100];
00114         char address[100];
00115         char destination[100];
00116         char broadcast[100];
00117 
00118         sigar_net_address_to_string(sig_,&ifconfig_.hwaddr,hwaddr);
00119         sigar_net_address_to_string(sig_,&ifconfig_.address,address);
00120         sigar_net_address_to_string(sig_,&ifconfig_.destination,destination);
00121         sigar_net_address_to_string(sig_,&ifconfig_.broadcast,broadcast);
00122 
00123         data->set_string("hwaddr",
00124                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00125                          hwaddr);
00126 
00127         data->set_string("address",
00128                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00129                          address);
00130         
00131         data->set_string("destination",
00132                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00133                          destination);
00134 
00135         data->set_string("broadcast",
00136                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00137                          broadcast);
00138 
00139         data->set_long("flags",
00140                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00141                        ifconfig_.flags);
00142 
00143         data->set_long("mtu",
00144                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00145                        ifconfig_.mtu);  
00146 
00147         data->set_long("metric",
00148                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00149                        ifconfig_.metric);
00150 
00151         //Interface Stat        
00152         sigar_net_interface_stat_get(sig_,iflist_.data[i],&ifstat_);
00153         
00154         //received
00155         data->set_longlong("rx_packets",
00156                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00157                        ifstat_.rx_packets);
00158 
00159         data->set_longlong("rx_bytes",
00160                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00161                        ifstat_.rx_bytes);
00162 
00163         data->set_long("rx_dropped",
00164                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00165                        ifstat_.rx_dropped);
00166 
00167         data->set_long("rx_overruns",
00168                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00169                        ifstat_.rx_overruns);
00170         
00171         data->set_long("rx_frame",
00172                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00173                        ifstat_.rx_frame);
00174 
00175         
00176         //transmited
00177         data->set_longlong("tx_packets",
00178                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00179                        ifstat_.tx_packets);
00180 
00181         data->set_longlong("tx_bytes",
00182                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00183                        ifstat_.tx_bytes);
00184 
00185         data->set_long("tx_errors",
00186                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00187                        ifstat_.tx_errors);
00188 
00189         data->set_long("tx_dropped",
00190                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00191                        ifstat_.tx_dropped);
00192 
00193         data->set_long("tx_overruns",
00194                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00195                        ifstat_.tx_overruns);
00196 
00197         data->set_long("tx_collisions",
00198                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00199                        ifstat_.tx_collisions);
00200 
00201         data->set_long("tx_carrier",
00202                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00203                        ifstat_.tx_carrier);
00204 
00205         timestamp_ = time(NULL);
00206         data->set_long("ts",
00207                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00208                        timestamp_);
00209         
00210         if(!publish_information(writer, data))
00211             return false;
00212         
00213     }
00214 
00215     sigar_net_interface_list_destroy(sig_,&iflist_);
00216     return true;
00217     
00218 }
